com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Interface IHitTestable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcEdgeStyleRenderer, BevelNodeStyleRenderer, CollapsibleNodeStyleDecoratorRenderer, DefaultLabelStyleRenderer, DefaultPortCandidateDescriptor, GeneralPathNodeStyleRenderer, IconLabelStyleRenderer, ImageNodeStyleRenderer, MemoryImageNodeStyleRenderer, PanelNodeStyleRenderer, PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer, PolylineEdgeStyleRenderer, ShapeNodeStyleRenderer, ShinyPlateNodeStyleRenderer, TableNodeStyleRenderer, TemplateLabelStyleRenderer, TemplateNodeStyleRenderer, TemplatePortStyleRenderer

    public interface IHitTestable
    Interface that is implemented for elements that can be hit or picked in a coordinate system.
    See Also:
    CanvasControl, ICanvasObjectDescriptor, ICanvasObject

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IHitTestable ALWAYS
      An IHitTestable that always returns true.
      static IHitTestable NEVER
      An IHitTestable that always returns false.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static IHitTestable create(IHitTestableHandler handler)
        Wrap a handler into an interface.

      • isHit

        boolean isHit(IInputModeContext context,
              PointD location)
        Determines if something has been hit at the given coordinates in the world coordinate system.

        Implementations should inspect the HitTestRadius and take the value into account when performing hit tests. This allows the user to hit elements even if the zoom level is very small and allows for accurate hit tests at greater zoom levels.

        Parameters:
        context - the context the hit test is performed in
        location - the coordinates in world coordinate system
        Returns:
        whether something has been hit
